name: xDeFi
introduce: xDeFi is a well established DeFi protocol stack.Many practices are introduced in xDeFi ecosystem, including but restricted to : xDEX as one of optimized AMM DEXes, xHalfLife as a money stream protocol for delayed unlocking of tokens, xOption as an European call and put option with AMM pools, xPerp as a perpetual protocol with shadow AMM, xSTA as a stable coin minted from crypto assets, xNFTEX as a NFT Market with Highly Liquidity, and any other DeFi building blocks.
